Description: I love playing guitar this beautiful guitar in my living or for home recording. I’ve never taken this baby out of the house. This guitar rivals the perfect neck on my 1961 6120 Chet Atkins that I owned back in the day. Included are the three original arrow knobs along with 4 replacement knurled knobs. There is one tiny ding at the lower bout as shown in picture. Hate to let it go but I’m paring down. The G6120RHH Reverend Horton Heat model is built to the Rev.’s own specs and rocks a distinctive combination of 1955-style Gretsch® western motifs and 1958-style pickups and controls. This is an early production model when the Reverend was allegedly still overseeing the specs.Features include TV Jones® Classic pickups, pinned Adjusto-Matic™ bridge, Gotoh® locking tuners, clear pickguard, “G” body brand, bound oversized F Holes, stained maple headstock overlay, multiple aged body bindings and aged fingerboard and headstock binding. The aged vintage wide-block pearloid inlays feature a western motif of cactus, steer heads and fences, and the headstock features pearloid steer head and Gretsch® logo inlays.Used Gretsch G6120RHH Excellent Condition - Serial # JT0511 7791 (2005 Production Model) - Made in Japan at the Terada Factory and comes with original Gretsch Hardshell Case - Professional Set-up by a top Luthier - Great actionFeaturesGretsch Horton Heat Signature ModelG6120RHHOrange Nitrocellulose Lacquer FinishHollow BodyLaminated Maple BodyParallel Tone Bars w/Trestle BracingMulti-ply Body Binding2.75" Body DepthMaple Neck24.6" Scale12" Fingerboard RadiusEbony Fingerboard1.6875" Nut WidthAged Vintage Western Block Inlay Position Markers of Cactus, Steerheads and FencesRouted “G” Brand on the BodyBound Oversized F-HolesAged Fingerboard and Headstock BindingTV Jones Classic Humbuckers2 x Volume ControlsMaster Volume3 Way ToggleWeighs 7 lbs 8 ozOriginal Hardshell Case Black3 Original Arrow Control Knobs4 Replacement Knurled Control KnobsMultiple Aged Body BindingClear Plexi Pickgaurd with Embossed “Gretsch”Polished Aluminum Bigsby®
Title: Gretsch 6120RHH Reverend Horton Heat Exc w/OHSC Used
